Header.title: We are the "Keys" to our Cleaner Community
Header.paragraph: At Northshore Disposal, we believe great service begins and ends with experienced and friendly professionals. We have prided ourselves on this belief for the last 60 years while serving numerous clients throughout the western St. Tammany area

About.paragraph: Northshore Disposal Services (NDS), also known as Rodney Keys and Sons, has been servicing customers in the West St. Tammany Area for over 60 years. This tenure of service is not an accident, but a testament to the quality and level of service that the Keys have always maintained.

Family.title: Here for the Long Haul
Family.description: Northshore Disposal Services (NDS) Also known as Rodney Keys and Sons, has been servicing customers in the west St. Tammany Area for over 60 years. This tenure of service is not an accident, but a testament to the quality of service that the Keys have maintained.

Family.title: Family First
Family.description: NDS is a family-owned and operated local business. Founded by the late Rodney Keys, Sr. in 1959 shortly after Mr. Keys maried the love of his life, Victoria. Today, NSD is operated by the second generation of the Keys Family, Rodney Jr. and Richard (Ricky).

Family.title: Service and Pride
Family.description: Both Rodney Jr. and Ricky started working in the business during their junior highschool years, where they learned Rodney Sr.'s business philosophy, "Do it Right! Work Smart! & Do Quality Work!." Rodney Jr. and Ricky use that philosophy to train their employees to maintain Northshore's high quality of service. The Keys level of commitment to their work is evident in their exemplary work ethic and consistent efforts going above the call of duty to serve their customers.
